title: Macworld Podcast: Apple Watch Series 10 and AirPods 4 reviews
description: Macworld In this episode of the Macworld Podcast, we review the new Apple Watch Series 10 and the AirPods 4. Are these new devices worth your money? We talk about what we like, dislike, and more! This is episode 904 with Jason Cross, Michael Simon, and Roman Loyola. Watch episode 904 on YouTube Listen to episode 904 on Apple Podcasts Listen to episode 904 on Spotify Get info  Click on the links below for more information on what was discussed on the show.  Apple Watch Series 10 review: Modest improvements to a proven formula AirPods 4 with ANC review: More pro for less dough Apple Watch Series 10 (42mm) Price When Reviewed: $399 Best Prices Today: $380 at Amazon$383.99 at Walmart Electronics$399 at Adorama Read our full Apple Watch Series 10 (42mm) review Apple Watch Series 10 (46mm) Price When Reviewed: $429 Best Prices Today: $405.99 at Amazon$429 at Adorama$429 at Best Buy Apple AirPods 4 (with ANC) Price When Reviewed: $179 with Active Noice Cancelation Best Prices Today: $168.99 at Amazon$179 at Adorama$179 at Apple Read our full Apple AirPods 4 (with ANC) review Apple AirPods 4 (without ANC) Price When Reviewed: $129 without Active Noise Cancelation Best Prices Today: $119 at Amazon$129 at Apple$129 at B&H Subscribe to the Macworld Podcast You can subscribe to the Macworld Podcast—or leave us a review!—right here in the Podcasts app. The Macworld Podcast is also available on Spotify and on the Macworld Podcast YouTube channel.  Or you can point your favorite podcast-savvy RSS reader at: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/macworld To find previous episodes, visit Macworld’s podcast page or our home on MegaPhone. Apple Apple Apple

html:
Skip to content

In this episode of the Macworld Podcast, we review the new Apple Watch Series 10 and the AirPods 4. Are these new devices worth your money? We talk about what we like, dislike, and more!

This is episode 904 with Jason Cross, Michael Simon, and Roman Loyola.

Watch episode 904 on YouTube

Listen to episode 904 on Apple Podcasts

Listen to episode 904 on Spotify

Get info 

Click on the links below for more information on what was discussed on the show. 

  • Apple Watch Series 10 review: Modest improvements to a proven formula
  • AirPods 4 with ANC review: More pro for less dough

Apple Watch Series 10 (46mm)

Price When Reviewed: $429

Apple AirPods 4 (without ANC)

Price When Reviewed: $129 without Active Noise Cancelation

Subscribe to the Macworld Podcast

You can subscribe to the Macworld Podcast—or leave us a review!—right here in the Podcasts app. The Macworld Podcast is also available on Spotify and on the Macworld Podcast YouTube channel.  Or you can point your favorite podcast-savvy RSS reader at: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/macworld

To find previous episodes, visit Macworld’s podcast page or our home on MegaPhone.
